mapper.insert: INSERT INTO leaveForms( leave_id, department_Name, account, applyTime, start_place, end_place, start_time, end_time, type, sum, note, state, processInstanceId, isDeleted ) VALUES ( uuid(), #{department_Name}, #{account}, #{applyTime}, #{start_place}, #{end_place}, #{start_time}, #{end_time}, #{type}, #{sum}, #{note}, #{state}, #{processInstanceId}, 0 )
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM leaveForms WHERE isDeleted=0 AND leave_id=#{leave_id}
mapper.update: UPDATE leaveForms SET isDeleted=1 WHERE leave_id=#{leave_id}
